If the target is a champion, {{tip|heal}} for {{as|88% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ {{rd|{{fd|2.2}}%|{{fd|1.1}}%}} of target's '''maximum''' health)|health}}.

If the number of additional targets fired at is less than the number of charges consumed,{{ft|deal an additional {{as|{{pp|45*0.35 to 45*5*0.35 for 5|1 to 5|changedisplay=true|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|4*0.35 to 4*5*0.35 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}} AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to the primary target, for a total of {{as|{{pp|(45*0.35)+45 to (45*5*0.35)+45 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|(4*0.35)+4 to (4*5*0.35)+4 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}} AP)}}.|deal an additional 35% damage to the primary target for each remaining charge.}}

Enemies hit in the center of the cone are {{tip|root|rooted}} for the same duration instead.

6657.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatAbilityPower">50</Stat><Stat name="FlatHealth">400</Stat><Stat name="FlatMana">400</Stat></Stats><Passive>Timeless </Passive>This item gains Health, Mana and Ability Power every 60 seconds. Upon reaching max stacks, gain a level.<Passive>Eternity </Passive>Taking damage from champions restores Mana.Casting an ability heals for a % of Mana spent.</MainText>

passives.name: Timeless
passives.effects: This item gains {{as|20 '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|20 '''bonus''' mana}}, and {{as|4 ability power}} every minute, up to 10 times, for a maximum of {{as|200 '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|200 '''bonus''' mana}}, and {{as|40 ability power}}. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (cap remains at level 18).

passives.name: Eternity
passives.effects: Restore {{as|mana}} equal to 7% of {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} taken from champions, and {{tip|heal}} for an amount equal to {{as|25% of mana spent}}, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second.

6660.name: Bami's Cinder
6660.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatHealth">300</Stat></Stats><Passive>Immolate </Passive>Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased against minions and monsters).</MainText>

passives.name: Immolate
passives.effects: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal {{as|13 {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% '''bonus''' health)}} magic damage|magic damage}} every second to enemies within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 325 (+ 100% '''bonus''' [[size]]) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions and monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

6662.name: Iceborn Gauntlet
6662.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatArmor">50</Stat><Stat name="FlatHealth">300</Stat><Stat name="FlatAbilityHaste">15</Stat></Stats><Passive>Spellblade </Passive>After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with additional damage and creates a frost field for 2s. Enemies that move across the field are <Status>Slowed </Status>.</MainText>
6662.simpleDescription: High Magic Resist.Passively slow nearby enemies. When spells are cast near you, release a wave of energy that damages and slows.

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an [[champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|100% '''base''' AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] and creates a 300 radius frost field for 2 seconds. Enemies within the field are slowed by {{rd|15%|{{fd|7.5}}%}} {{as|(+ {{rd|{{fd|0.4}}%|{{fd|0.2}}%}} per 100 '''maximum''' health)}}.

6664.name: Hollow Radiance
6664.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatHealth">1100</Stat><Stat name="PercentMovespeed">15%</Stat></Stats><Passive>Immolate </Passive>Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.<Passive>Desolate </Passive>Killing an enemy deals magic damage in an area around them.</MainText>

active.name: Supercharged

After the duration or when an enemy champion is within {{tt|225 units|center to edge}}, you unleash a shockwave, {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemy champions within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 450 units by 50% for 2 seconds.

6664.simpleDescription: Immobilize enemies to gain a shield. Activate to run faster at opponents.

passives.name: Charged
passives.effects: Gain 30% {{tip|slow resist}}.

6665.name: Jak'Sho, The Protean
6665.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatArmor">50</Stat><Stat name="FlatHealth">300</Stat><Stat name="FlatMagicResistance">50</Stat></Stats><Passive>Voidborn Resilience </Passive>During combat with champions become empowered, increasing your bonus <ScaleArmor>Armor </ScaleArmor>and <ScaleMR>Magic Resist </ScaleMR>until end of combat.</MainText>

passives.name: Voidborn Resilience
passives.effects: Gain a stack for each second [[Combat status|in combat]] with enemy champions, stacking up to 5 times. At '''maximum''' stacks, increase your {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}} by 30% until the end of combat.

passives.name: Guiding Light

While ''Transcended'', increase your {{as|'''maximum''' health by {{fd|12.5}}%}} and cause you and all allies within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 1200 units to {{tip|heal}} for {{as|4% of your '''maximum''' health}} upon you ''Transcending'' and every 3 seconds thereafter.

passives.name: Precision

403520%

passives.name: Impermanence

passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] grant {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds

7019.name: Reliquary of the Golden Dawn
7019.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatArmor">40</Stat><Stat name="FlatHealth">350</Stat><Stat name="FlatMagicResistance">40</Stat><Stat name="FlatAbilityHaste">20</Stat></Stats><Active>Active - Devotion </Active>Grant nearby allies a <Shield>Shield </Shield>, decaying over time.</MainText>

active.name: Devotion
active.effects: Grants you and allied champions within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 850 units a {{tip|shield}} for {{pp|200 to 360|type=target's level}} that decays over {{fd|2.5}} seconds.

7020.name: Shurelya's Requiem
7020.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatAbilityPower">70</Stat><Stat name="PercentManaRegen">200%</Stat><Stat name="PercentMovespeed">10%</Stat><Stat name="FlatAbilityHaste">25</Stat></Stats><Active>ACTIVE </Active>(0s)<Active>Inspiring Speech </Active>Grants nearby allies Move Speed.</MainText>

active.name: Inspiring Speech
active.effects: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units {{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 4 seconds.

7021.name: Starcaster
7021.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatAbilityPower">50</Stat><Stat name="FlatHealth">300</Stat><Stat name="PercentManaRegen">200%</Stat><Stat name="FlatAbilityHaste">25</Stat></Stats><Passive>Starlit Grace </Passive>Healing or shielding an ally chains to the nearest ally champion for a percentage of the original amount.</MainText>

passives.name: Starlit Grace
passives.effects: {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} an allied champion chains the effect to the other nearest allied champion within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 800 units of them (''excluding yourself''), granting them 40% of the heal or 45% of the shield's initial strength. If no other allied champions are in the radius, grant the same target an additional 30% of the heal or 35% of the shield.

7022.name: Certainty
7022.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatAttackDamage">70</Stat><Stat name="FlatLethality">27</Stat><Stat name="PercentMovespeed">8%</Stat></Stats><Passive>Eminence </Passive>When a champion that you have damaged dies, gain Attack Damage.<Passive>Ego </Passive>Killing champions creates a statue of yourself, if you already have a statue it upgrades.</MainText>

passives.name: Preparation
passives.effects: After being [[Combat status|out-of-combat]] with enemy champions for 8 seconds, gain {{as|{{pp|5;5.5 to 10 for 10|1;8 to 17|formula=5 + 0.5 starting at level 8 and until level 17}} lethality}}. This bonus remains for 3 seconds after dealing damage to an enemy champion.

passives.name: Extraction
passives.effects: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them grants you {{as|150 '''bonus''' movement speed}} that decays over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

7025.name: Leviathan
7025.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatHealth">1150</Stat><Stat name="PercentHealthRegen">300%</Stat></Stats><Passive>Colossal Consumption </Passive>(0s) per targetCharge up a powerful attack against a champion over time while near them. The charged attack deals bonus physical damage and grants permanent max Health.<Passive>Goliath </Passive>Gain increased size based on Total Health.</MainText>

passives.name: Colossal Consumption
passives.effects: While within 700 units of an enemy champion, generate a stack on them each second, stacking up to 3 times. Your next basic attack against a target with 3 stacks is empowered to consume them all to deal {{as|80|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 12% '''bonus''' health '''from items''')}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] and grant you permanent {{as|'''bonus''' health}} equal to{{ft|12% of that amount|{{as|{{ap|80*0.12}} (+ {{ap|12*0.12}}% '''bonus''' health '''from items''')}}}}

passives.name: Goliath
passives.effects: Gain {{as|{{pp|key=%|0 to 30 for 11|0 to 10000|type='''maximum''' health}}|hp}} increased size.

7026.name: The Unspoken Parasite
7026.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatArmor">60</Stat><Stat name="FlatHealth">550</Stat><Stat name="FlatMagicResistance">60</Stat></Stats><Passive>Voidborn Resilience </Passive>During combat with champions become empowered, increasing your bonus <ScaleArmor>Armor </ScaleArmor>and <ScaleMR>Magic Resist </ScaleMR>until end of combat.</MainText>

passives.name: Voidborn Resilience
passives.effects: Gain a stack for each second [[Combat status|in combat]] with enemy champions, stacking up to 5 times. At '''maximum''' stacks, increase your {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}} by 30% until the end of combat.

7028.name: Infinite Convergence
7028.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatAbilityPower">70</Stat><Stat name="FlatHealth">550</Stat><Stat name="FlatMana">650</Stat></Stats><Passive>Timeless </Passive>This item gains Health, Mana and Ability Power every 60 seconds. Upon reaching max stacks, gain a level.<Passive>Eternity </Passive>Taking damage from champions restores Mana.Casting an ability heals for a % of Mana spent.</MainText>

passives.name: Timeless
passives.effects: This item gains {{as|20 '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|20 '''bonus''' mana}}, and {{as|4 ability power}} every minute, up to 10 times, for a maximum of {{as|200 '''bonus''' health}}, {{as|200 '''bonus''' mana}}, and {{as|40 ability power}}. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (cap remains at level 18).

passives.name: Eternity
passives.effects: Restore {{as|mana}} equal to 7% of {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}} taken from champions, and {{tip|heal}} for an amount equal to {{as|25% of mana spent}}, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second.

7029.name: Youmuu's Wake
7029.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatAttackDamage">75</Stat><Stat name="FlatLethality">27</Stat></Stats><Passive>Haunt </Passive>Gain <Speed>Move Speed </Speed>while out of combat.<Active>ACTIVE </Active>(0s)<Active>Wraith Step </Active>Gain <Speed>Move Speed </Speed>and <Keyword>Ghosting </Keyword>.</MainText>

active.name: Wraith Step
active.effects: Gain {{as|{{rd|20%|15%}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} and {{tip|ghosted|ghosting}} for 6 seconds.

passives.name: Haunt
passives.effects: Gain {{as|{{rd|40|20}} '''bonus''' movement speed}} while out-of-combat.

7030.name: Seething Sorrow
7030.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatAbilityPower">55</Stat><Stat name="FlatAttackDamage">45</Stat><Stat name="FlatAttackSpeed">35</Stat></Stats><Passive>Wrath </Passive>Attacks apply <MagicDamage>30 magic damage <OnHit>On-Hit </OnHit></MagicDamage>.<Passive>Seething Strike </Passive>Basic attacks grant <AttackSpeed>8% Attack Speed </AttackSpeed>, stacking up to 4 times for a maximum of <AttackSpeed>0 Attack Speed </AttackSpeed>. While fully stacked, every third Attack applies your <OnHit>On-Hit </OnHit>effects twice.</MainText>

passives.name: Wrath
passives.effects: Basic attacks deal {{as|30 '''bonus''' magic damage}} on-hit.

passives.name: Seething Strike
passives.effects: Basic attacks grant {{as|8% '''bonus''' attack speed}} for 3 seconds, stacking up to 4 times for a total of {{as|32% '''bonus''' attack speed}}. At maximum stacks, basic attacks on-attack also grant a ''Phantom'' stack for 6 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 ''Phantom'' stacks, the next basic attack consumes all of those stacks on-attack to trigger a ''Phantom Hit'' that applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects to the target at 100% effectiveness after a {{fd|0.15}} second delay.

7032.name: Flicker
7032.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Passive>Transcendence </Passive>Your Attacks reduce your non-Ultimate Ability cooldowns.<Passive>Impermanence </Passive>Your abilities deal increased damage based on Critical Strike Chance.</MainText>

7033.name: Cry of the Shrieking City
7033.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatAbilityPower">60</Stat><Stat name="FlatHealth">300</Stat><Stat name="PercentManaRegen">175%</Stat><Stat name="FlatAbilityHaste">25</Stat></Stats><Passive>Soul Siphon </Passive>Damaging a champion grants a <Passive>Soul Shard </Passive>. Healing or Shielding an ally consumes all <Passive>Soul Shards </Passive>to heal the ally and deal magic damage to the nearest enemy champion per Shard.</MainText>

passives.name: Soul Siphon
passives.effects: Damaging an enemy champion with a basic attack or [[ability damage]] grants a ''Soul Shard'', up to 3. {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} an allied champion (''excluding yourself'') consumes all ''Soul Shards'' to heal them for 40 per shard and deal {{as|45 magic damage}} per shard to the nearest enemy champion within 1100 units of the ally.

7034.name: Hope Adrift
7034.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatArmor">65</Stat><Stat name="FlatHealth">600</Stat><Stat name="FlatAbilityHaste">20</Stat></Stats><Passive>Anguish </Passive>While in combat with champions, every few seconds, deal magic damage to nearby enemy champions, healing based on the damage dealt.</MainText>

passives.name: Anguish
passives.effects: Every 7 seconds in combat with champions, deal {{as|{{pp|30 to 50}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 3% '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemy champions within 650 units and {{tip|heal}} yourself equal to 250% of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} dealt.

7035.name: Daybreak
7035.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Passive>First Light </Passive>Gain <Healing>3% Heal and Shield Power </Healing>and <ScaleAP>5 Ability Power </ScaleAP>per 100% Base Mana Regen.<Passive>Radiance </Passive>Gain 18 Summoner Spell Haste.</MainText>

passives.name: Hexcharged
passives.effects: Gain 30 [[Haste#Ultimate haste|ultimate haste]].

passives.name: Overdrive
passives.effects: Upon casting your ultimate ability, enter ''Overdrive'' to gain {{as|30% '''bonus''' attack speed}} and {{as|15% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 8 seconds.

7037.name: Obsidian Cleaver
7037.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatAttackDamage">65</Stat><Stat name="FlatHealth">600</Stat><Stat name="FlatAbilityHaste">25</Stat></Stats><Passive>Carve </Passive>Dealing physical damage to a champion applies a stack of Armor reduction.<Passive>Fervor </Passive>Dealing physical damage grants Move Speed.</MainText>

passives.name: Carve
passives.effects: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to an enemy champion applies a stack of ''Carve'' for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack inflicts {{as|5% armor reduction}}, up to {{as|25%|armor}} at 5 stacks.

passives.name: Fervor
passives.effects: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} grants you {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

7038.name: Shojin's Resolve
7038.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatAttackDamage">65</Stat><Stat name="FlatHealth">500</Stat><Stat name="FlatAbilityHaste">25</Stat></Stats><Passive>Dragonforce </Passive>Your Non-Ultimate spells gain Ability Haste.<Passive>Focused Will </Passive>Spell hits grant stacks. Your spells deal increased damage for each stack.</MainText>

passives.name: Dragonforce
passives.effects: Gain 15 [[Haste#Basic ability haste|basic ability haste]].

passives.name: Focused Will
passives.effects: Dealing [[ability damage]] with a [[champion ability]] grants a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times and up to 1 per {{tip|cast instance}} per second and every second for [[damage over time]] abilities. For each stack, your [[ability damage]] and [[damage|proc damage]] dealt by [[champion ability|abilities]] gain 3% increased damage, for a total increase of 12% at '''maximum''' stacks.

7039.name: Heavensfall
7039.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatAttackDamage">60</Stat><Stat name="FlatHealth">600</Stat><Stat name="FlatAbilityHaste">20</Stat></Stats><Passive>Lightshield Strike </Passive>The first basic attack against a champion Crits and heals. Excess healing is granted as temporary bonus Health.</MainText>

passives.name: Lightshield Strike
passives.effects: Your next basic attack against a champion is empowered to {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for 175% damage and {{tip|heal}} you for {{as|140% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ 8% of your '''missing''' health)}}. Excess healing beyond {{as|'''maximum''' health}} is converted to {{as|'''bonus''' health}} for 6 seconds.

7040.name: Eye of the Storm
7040.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatAttackDamage">80</Stat><Stat name="FlatAttackSpeed">25</Stat><Stat name="PercentCriticalStrikeChance">20%</Stat></Stats><Passive>Bolt </Passive>Your Energized Attack applies bonus magic damage and grants Move Speed.</MainText>

passives.name: Energized
passives.effects: Moving and basic attacking generates ''Energize'' stacks, up to 100.

passives.name: Bolt
passives.effects: When fully {{tip|Energized}}, your next basic attack deals {{as|100 '''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]] and grants you {{as|45% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

7041.name: Wyrmfallen Sacrifice
7041.description:
604520%
  • Bring It Down: Every third basic attack deals additional physical damage on-hit, increasing when hitting the same target repeatedly.

passives.name: Bring It Down
passives.effects: Basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks to deal {{as|{{pp|140 to 310 for 11|1;9 to 18}} '''bonus''' physical damage|physical damage}} {{tip|on-hit}}. Consuming stacks on the same target within 6 seconds increases the damage by 50%, up to 100% for a maximum of {{as|{{pp|140*2 to 310*2 for 11|1;9 to 18}}|physical damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.

passives.name: Icathian Bite
passives.effects: Basic attacks deal {{as|15 {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} '''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}} [[on-hit]].

8001.name: Anathema's Chains
8001.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatHealth">650</Stat><Stat name="FlatAbilityHaste">20</Stat></Stats><Passive>Vendetta </Passive>You gain Vendetta stacks over time Each stack of Vendetta grants you 1% reduced damage from your Nemesis.<Passive>Vengeance </Passive>At maximum stacks, your Nemesis has reduced Tenacity while near you.<Active>ACTIVE </Active>(0s)<Active>Vow </Active>Choose a Nemesis.</MainText>

active.name: Vow
active.effects: Curse the target enemy champion, designating them as your ''Nemesis'' and granting you 1 stack of ''Vendetta'' every 2 seconds over 60 seconds, stacking up to 30 times. These stacks are lost upon selecting a new ''Nemesis''. Cannot be cast for 15 seconds while in combat with enemy champions.

passives.name: Vendetta
passives.effects: Take 1% reduced damage per stack of ''Vendetta'' from your ''Nemesis'', up to 30% damage reduction against them.

passives.name: Vengeance
passives.effects: At '''maximum''' stacks, your ''Nemesis'' has 20% reduced {{tip|tenacity}} while they are within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 700 units of you.

8020.name: Abyssal Mask
8020.description: <MainText><Stats><Stat name="FlatHealth">300</Stat><Stat name="FlatMagicResistance">60</Stat><Stat name="FlatAbilityHaste">10</Stat></Stats><Passive>Unmake </Passive>Reduce nearby enemy champions Magic Resist. For each enemy affected, gain Magic Resist.</MainText>

passives.name: Unmake
passives.effects: Enemy champions within {{tt|550 units|center to edge}} of you become cursed, reducing their {{as|magic resistance by 5}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.2}}% '''bonus''' health)}}, capped at a reduction of {{as|25|magic resistance}}. Gain {{as|9 '''bonus''' magic resistance}} per cursed enemy.

126697.name: Hubris
126697.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Passive>Eminence </Passive>Gain temporary AD based on champion kills on kill.</MainText>

127008.name: Ataraxia
127008.description: <MainText><Stats></Stats><Passive>Eminence </Passive>When a champion that you have damaged dies, gain Attack Damage.<Passive>Ego </Passive>Killing champions creates a statue of yourself, if you already have a statue it upgrades.</MainText>
